alert.note: Alert for Eastern Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 12:47PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with heavy rain will impact portions of northeastern Marion and western Putnam Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1245 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a few intense thunderstorms in western Putnam County that were moving very little. Heavy rainfall from these storms could produce minor flooding. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Interlachen, Melrose Landing, Hollister, Florahome, Hog Valley, Johnson, Putnam Hall and Mannville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
